snippet.title: Polar Pool
snippet.description:
~Love Games? Subscribe and click the Bell to get notified of new game releases every day!

Polar Pool brings a new game to the Polar franchise from WildTangent Games. In Polar Pool you can play classic games like 8 and 9-ball or use power-ups, bonus pockets and special characters to master the game of Power Pool.

You can try the game for free here: 
http://www.wildtangent.com/Games/polarpool

WildTangent Links:
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/WildTangentGames
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/PlayWildTangent
TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/wildtangentgames
PINTEREST: https://www.pinterest.com/playwildtangent/
EMAIL: https://goo.gl/nix4aW
